mapper.select: SELECT /* pp.lists */ LPAD(' ',(LEVEL-1)*2, ' ') || A.KN_CUST AS KN_CUST2 ,A.KN_CUST ,A.CORPID ,A.PARENT_CP ,A.CP_KIND FROM TCM_PP A START WITH A.CP_KIND = 'CPDS0100' CONNECT BY PRIOR A.CORPID = A.PARENT_CP ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.CORPID

SELECT /* pp_SQL.list */ ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.CORPID DESC) RNUM ,A.CORPID ,A.KN_CUST ,A.YN_LEGAL ,A.KN_BUSINESSCOND ,A.KN_ITEM ,A.NO_TAX ,A.KN_PRESIDENT ,A.YN_USE ,A.CP_KIND FROM TCM_PP A WHERE 1=1 AND A.CP_KIND = 'CPDS0100'
AND A.CORPID LIKE '%' || #{s_cd_cust} || '%'
AND UPPER(A.KN_CUST )LIKE '%' || UPPER( #{s_kn_cust} ) || '%'
ORDER BY A.CORPID DESC

SELECT /* pp_SQL.scp_list */ ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.CORPID DESC) RNUM ,A.CORPID ,A.KN_CUST ,A.KN_BUSINESSCOND ,A.KN_PRESIDENT ,A.YN_USE ,A.CP_KIND FROM TCM_PP A WHERE 1=1 AND A.CP_KIND = 'CPDS0200' AND A.PARENT_CP = ${s_corpid} ORDER BY A.CORPID DESC

SELECT /* pp_SQL.detail */ A.CORPID ,A.KN_CUST ,A.NO_TAX ,A.KN_PRESIDENT ,A.KN_BUSINESSCOND ,A.KN_ITEM ,A.CL_CUST ,A.NO_POST ,A.KN_ADDRESS||' '||A.KN_ADDRESS2 AS KN_ADDRESS ,A.NO_TEL ,A.NO_FAX ,A.YN_USE ,A.KN_CUSTEMP ,A.KN_CUSTTEL ,A.E_MAIL ,A.CP_KIND FROM TCM_PP A WHERE 1=1 AND A.CP_KIND = #{s_cp_kind} AND A.CORPID = #{s_corpid}
